nodes.text: Tei-Untis was a planet that had Zabraks among its inhabitants. A kleptocracy, it was governed by thieves. Some of the most skilled pickpockets in the galaxy were trained at the Tei-Untisian School of Ribbons.

Tei-Untis was created for the mobile game Star Wars: Uprising, which was developed by Kabam for iOS and Android platforms and released in 2015, before its shutdown in 2016. It was mentioned in the description of the "Tei-Untisian Pickpocket," one of many crew members who could be sent on Crew Runs for helpful items.
